column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Back in the mid to late 2000s
column2: I used to come here and spend a lot of money on not a lot of food (although delicious).  Fast forward almost 10 years
column3: and nothing has changed.  The plates are so small and light
column4: you need to handle them with delicate hands.  If you've got the shakes
column5: your food will go flying off your plate.  You've been warned!
